```{r setup, include=FALSE}
readRDS('testLOESSdata.rds')

```

```{r}
head(testLOESSdata)
```

```{r}
mNDVI=testLOESSdata %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarise(meanNDVI = mean(ndvi_raw))
```
#regular smooth
```{r}
ndvi_p = plot_ly() %>%
  add_trace(
    x=mNDVI$date,
    y=mNDVI$meanNDVI
  )%>%
  add_lines(
    x=mNDVI$date, 
    y=smooth(mNDVI$meanNDVI)
  )
ndvi_p
```
#use this one
```{r}
ndvi_p = plot_ly() %>%
  add_trace(
    x=mNDVI$date,
    y=mNDVI$meanNDVI
  )%>%
  add_lines(
    x=mNDVI$date, 
    y=~fitted(smooth.spline(mNDVI$meanNDVI~as.numeric(mNDVI$date)), data=mNDVI)
  )
ndvi_p

```
